III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code Program statement
Title
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4109
Section (1) An institution shall have and follow a current written program
Description statement which specifically addresses all of the following:
(c) Policies and procedures pertaining to admission, care,
safety, and supervision, methods for addressing residents' needs,
implementation of treatment plans, and discharge of residents.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation Staff is tickling youth and touching her butt.
Investigation DHHS Worker and I learned of tickling allegations while
conducting interviews for a different investigation
(2025SIC0000165). As a result, those interviews are added to
this investigation even though the interviews were prior to the
intake date. During those interviews another allegation of
Supervisor 2 allegedly touching Youth A’s butt was learned so
both allegations are addressed in this investigation report.
Youth D was interviewed via telephone on December 4, 2024,
in collaboration with DHHS Worker who was at the facility
with Youth D. Youth D reported Youth A told her Supervisor 2
“touched” Youth A inappropriately. Youth D stated she did not
know what Youth A meant by that statement. Youth D denied
seeing Supervisor 2 touch Youth A. Youth D reported Supervisor
2 did not touch Youth D in any inappropriate sexual way.
Youth E was interviewed via telephone on December 4, 2024,
in collaboration with DHHS Worker who was at the facility
with Youth E. Youth E denied ever seeing Supervisor 2 put his
hands on any youth.
Youth A was interviewed via telephone on December 4, 2024,
in collaboration with DHHS Worker who was at the facility
2

with Youth A. Youth A described feeling uncomfortable around
Supervisor 2 because recently Supervisor 2 tickled her on the side
of her stomach when she had her shirt off. Youth A stated she
was hot, so she took her shirt off. Youth A reported it occurred on
November 27, 2024. Youth A stated she knows the exact date
because it is the birthday of her deceased best friend. Youth A
described being in the unit and wanting to leave because she was
upset. Youth A stated Supervisor 2, Staff 3, Staff 4, Staff 5, and
Staff 6 were in the unit when Supervisor 2 tickled Youth A. Youth
A reported the other staff saw Supervisor 2 tickle her. Youth A
reported she was crying when Supervisor 2 tickled her, and she
thought Supervisor 2 was trying to make her laugh. Youth A
stated she told Supervisor 2 to stop, Youth A got down from the
table she was standing on and walked away from Supervisor 2.
Youth A reported this was the first time Supervisor 2 ever tickled
her. Youth A denied Supervisor 2 touching her on any other part
of her body. Youth A stated Supervisor 2 has tickled Youth B and
maybe Youth D. Youth A described Supervisor 2 as a “touchy
feely” person.
Youth A was interviewed on 12/20/24 at the Tuscola County Child
Advocacy Center (CAC) with DHHS Worker at the CAC office and
DCWL Supervisor observing the interview via Zoom regarding the
allegation Supervisor 2 touched Youth A’s butt. Youth A reported
being tickled by Supervisor 2 when she was wearing only a sports
bra and shorts in the unit. Youth A stated other staff were working
when this occurred, and she told Child Protective Services (MIC)
about the incident. Youth A reported this is the only way
Supervisor 2 has ever touched her. Youth A denied Supervisor 2
ever touching her “behind.” Youth A stated she believed
Supervisor 2 has tickled Youth D and Youth B, who is no longer at
the facility.
Staff 8 and Staff 9 were interviewed separately face to face at
the facility on December 10, 2024. They both denied ever
seeing Supervisor 2 tickle Youth A or any youth. They both stated
they did not have any concerns with how Supervisor 2 interacts
with any of the youth.
Staff 7 was interviewed face to face at the facility on
December 10, 2024, in collaboration with DHHS Worker. Staff
7 denied having any concerns regarding Supervisor 2. Staff 7
reported Supervisor 2 treats the youth fairly and holds the youth
accountable which the youth do not like. Staff 7 stated she has
never seen Supervisor 2 tickle any of the youth or any youth tell
her Supervisor 2 has tickled them.
3

Staff 10 was interviewed via telephone on December 13, 2024,
in collaboration with DHHS Worker. Staff 10 is no longer
employed at the facility. Staff 10 described seeing Supervisor 2
tickle Youth A on her side or in Youth A’s armpit area. Staff 10
reported Supervisor 2 would do this to deescalate Youth A or to
make her laugh. Staff 10 denied seeing Supervisor 2 tickle Youth
A when Youth A’s shirt was off. Staff 10 reported he felt
Supervisor 2’s behavior was sometimes appropriate but
sometimes it felt like grooming behavior. Staff 10 described
Supervisor 2 would have this same behavior with Youth B. Staff
10 stated before he was fired by the facility Youth A disclosed
Supervisor 2 had touched Youth A’s butt. Staff 10 changed her
story as to when Youth A disclosed this information. Staff 10
denied telling anyone at the facility what Youth A told him because
he was “out the door.”
Staff 2 was interviewed via telephone on December 20, 2024,
in collaboration with DHHS Worker. Staff 2 denied ever seeing
Supervisor 1 tickle Youth A or any other youth. Staff 2 stated
none of the girls have reported any concerns about Supervisor 2
tickling. Staff 2 stated, “I don’t play that” and would have said
something if she saw Supervisor 2 tickle any youth.
Youth B was interviewed via telephone on January 7, 2024, in
collaboration with DHHS Worker. Youth B was discharged from
the facility on 11/22/24. Youth B denied seeing Supervisor 2 ever
tickle any youth. Youth B denied Supervisor 2 ever tickled her.
Youth B reported she never saw Supervisor 2 touch or act
inappropriately toward Youth A. Youth B stated Supervisor 2
would put his arm out and say “arm check” if a girl would try and
hug him or get too close to him.
Youth C was interviewed face to face at the facility on
January 7, 2024, in collaboration with DHHS Worker. Youth C
denied ever seeing any staff tickle any youth. Youth C denied
ever seeing Supervisor 2 touch Youth A or any youth on the
youth’s butt.
Staff 3 was interviewed via telephone on December 13 and
January 7, 2024, in collaboration with DHHS Worker. Staff 3
described Supervisor 2 as being by the book and holding the
youth accountable for their behaviors. Staff 3 denied ever seeing
Supervisor 2 tickle any of the youth. Staff 3 described a time
working with Supervisor 2 in the unit and Youth A was upset and
wanted to leave the unit. Staff 3 reported Youth A kept coming
4

toward Supervisor 2 and he would say, “arm check” meaning “give
me my space.” Staff 3 denied ever seeing Supervisor 2 touch
Youth A’s butt or any part of Youth A’s body inappropriately. Staff
3 reported no youth have come to her with concerns regarding
Supervisor 2.
Supervisor 1 was interviewed face to face at the facility on
January 7, 2024, in collaboration with DHHS Worker.
Supervisor 1 denied ever seeing Supervisor 2 tickle any of the
youth or touch Youth A on the butt. Supervisor 1 stated he never
saw or heard Supervisor 2 say anything inappropriate to any
youth. Supervisor 1 denied Staff 10 ever reported any concerns
regarding Supervisor 2 to him. Supervisor 1 reported Staff 10 was
let go from the facility.
Supervisor 2 was interviewed face to face at the facility on
December 10, 2024 (tickling allegation) and January 7, 2024
(touching the butt allegation), in collaboration with DHHS
Worker. Supervisor 2 denied touching Youth A or any youth on
the butt or tickling any youth. Supervisor 2 stated, “I’m not that
fucking person.” Supervisor 2 reported he believed some of the
youths are trying to get him fired from the facility because
Supervisor 2 is holding youth accountable, and the youth are mad
at him. Supervisor 2 stated the day in question about when he
allegedly tickled Youth A there were other staff in the unit with him
and there would be video to review to see he never tickled Youth
A. Supervisor 2 reported the sexual allegations against him are
“pissing him off.” Supervisor 2 stated he would be fine with other
allegations against him but not the sexual stuff. Supervisor 2
stated he has family that has been touched so he “doesn’t play
that shit.”
Supervisor 2 reported Youth A likes to try and get close to him.
Supervisor 2 described when Youth A does this or any of the
youth, Supervisor 2 gives a “hand check” and tells the youths to
stop. Supervisor 2 again stated he has never tickled any of the
youth or touched Youth A’s butt.
Staff 4 was interviewed via telephone on January 15, 2024.
Staff 4 denied ever seeing Supervisor 2 tickle Youth A or touch
Youth A on the butt. Staff 4 reported no youth or staff ever stated
Supervisor 2 was tickling youth or touch youth inappropriately.
Staff 4 denied seeing Supervisor 2 tickle or touch any youth
inappropriately. Staff 4 described the day in the unit when Youth
A was trying to leave the unit, Supervisor 2 gave Youth A a “hand
5

check” but denied Supervisor 2 made any physical contact with
Youth A.
Video Reviewed
Video footage of 11/27/24 in Unit 3 was reviewed with DHHS
Worker. Video shows Supervisor 2, Staff 3, Staff 4 and Staff 6
also in the unit. At no time on the video is Supervisor 2 seen
tickling Youth A or touching Youth A’s butt. Video shows Staff 3
and Staff 4 following Youth A around the unit, Youth A standing on
a table and Supervisor 2 standing near the door. At one point
Youth A approaches Supervisor 2, with Staff 3 and Staff 4
following Youth A. From the camera angle one can only see the
lower part of Youth A, Supervisor 2, Staff 3 and Staff 4’s bodies.
Youth A was upset and wandering around the unit from
approximately 7pm to 7:15pm. This entire time period was
reviewed as well as continuing video review until approximately
8pm.
Documents Reviewed:
• Agency response plan dated 12/04/24 for Supervisor 2
documenting Supervisor 2 will not be alone with any youth
at any time. This agency response plan was regarding the
allegation of Supervisor 2 tickling youth.
• Agency response plan dated 12/13/24 for Supervisor 2
documenting Supervisor 2 was placed on administrative
leave. This agency response plan was regarding the
allegation of Supervisor 2 touching Youth A’s butt.
• Supervisor 2’s personnel file. There was no disciplinary
record.
• Wolverine Behavior Support and Management Policy.
Policy states Wolverine Human Services is committed to
maintaining a culture of respect for all persons, clients and
staff alike. This policy is for the purpose of ensuring that
when a non-violent physical intervention is required, that
the manner in which it is used is in strict adherence with
applicable state and federal requirements governing its
use.
Analysis The agency is found in compliance as per multiple youths and
staff interviews as well as video review Supervisor 2 is never seen
tickling or touching Youth A on the butt. Youth A denied
Supervisor 2 touched her butt.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
6

IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on investigative findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the current license status be
continued.
